what is luna game?

luna game is a mlp creepy pasta horror series from the early 2010s

the first one in the series "luna game" was posted on equestria daily under the game section just 4 months after the erring my little pony friendship is magic.

Just a couple a hours later the game became the talk of the site due to it's controversial nature, and was quickly scraped of the site by the moderators.

But it's legacy lived on and spawned many fan games of similar nature.

If you like to learn more I'd suggest cheeking out these links.

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=luna+game

https://creepypasta.fandom.com/wiki/Luna_Game

https://mlpfanart.fandom.com/wiki/Luna_Game
